resources.string: The rise and possibility of occurring an incident that violates NED discipline motivated us to develop such an app that equips every student with basic need to call for help whenever threatened by any such act.
Our application aims to protect people from physical violence, whether within the NED or outside the premises of NED, from violent individuals, from domestic abuse, or from predatory adults.

Our group has been fortunate enough to have Miss Mehwish as mentor as she has consistently maintained strong business ethics while keeping a smile on her face. She has been more of a friend than our teacher through out semester and made sure that we achieve our potential and it was her way of teaching that made us put in the effort. Thanks for being a good mentor and for guiding us. We will always be thankful to you.

1.Farrrukh Siddiqui (CS-20090) 
2. Muhammad Faizan (CS-20098) 
3.Hamza Naveed (CS-20119) 
4. Umer Khalil (CS-20135)
